title: Your Main/ Favorite Champion is now your Wingman/Wingwoman (right?) how do you feel
body:
{{champion:44}}: So confident, with this guy helping me I might as well own her... unless he steals her from me
http://38.media.tumblr.com/c1591ed4f9fa7fc1f7941d252d8f3922/tumblr_mjvkah4Q4m1rjcfxro1_400.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:245}} He can rewind time to give me infinite retries when I fail.
{{champion:86}} He'd probably scare all my dates away by hiding behind things, then jumping out and yelling "**_DEMACIA!_**"

http://41.media.tumblr.com/b0b785ab32de3bafbfc7ff92b6fd1c3d/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo1_500.png
http://41.media.tumblr.com/ad8b4c116c10f2ac75e54f93ed963c54/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo2_500.png
http://41.media.tumblr.com/78d3dbec2b3fe12a960f69c9da0209c6/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo3_500.png
http://40.media.tumblr.com/d199be202bbbaab29ba95f2c5dd92881/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo4_500.png
http://40.media.tumblr.com/6f7fbac0ee7e5339d537e67d452475a3/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo5_500.png
http://41.media.tumblr.com/d314bd8c438419f00899b8edef31eb3a/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo6_500.png
http://40.media.tumblr.com/a73649ecb1ba77ec3a29111c945b16ca/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo7_500.png
http://41.media.tumblr.com/81195a657605bd598ec39c1ed52de496/tumblr_nofa9f5ZT31tof9kfo8_500.png

Link to original comic, plus more: http://zulidoodles.tumblr.com/

> {{champion:245}} He can rewind time to give me infinite retries when I fail.

Now that's just cheating.

{{champion:245}} 
"Ok, so don't open with...
Hey ladies,
How are you doing today girls?
Heeeelooooo...
Or,
Let me buy you a drink.


In fact maybe just give up now. I don't think infinite retries will help."

Ouch Ekko. Ouch.

{{champion:254}}  Drinks hard, talks loud, wins at pool, and doesn't get the hint to leave. Randomly dances in place when her song comes on because she doesn't take requests and gets so smashed you have to take her home instead of a prospect because you're not sure she'll remember where she left her keys in her whole two pockets.

First of all, that GIF is amazing.

Second, considering my favorite champion is {{champion:121}}...
Yeah, i don't think this is a good decision at all, I'm honestly concerned he may eat the girl I'm talking with. Dang void bugs eating my women.
;-;

She will not expect this XD
http://38.media.tumblr.com/ab986a4d50ebbc1542820108a7ca6f32/tumblr_inline_mxtudqgnyu1rkah05.gif

{{champion:16}} 
Wait, why'd we leave to pick up girls?

{{champion:126}} {{champion:43}} 

I feel like these two would argue about how to pick up dates.

{{champion:43}} :"You should introduce yourself, and complement them on somethi-

{{champion:126}} :"Uh, no. That's not how you do it! You flirt with them, guys love that! Be like "'Are those galaxy pants? Because your ass is out of this world!"'

{{champion:43}}  :"Jayce! I don't think that's how yo-"

{{champion:126}} :"Yes it is, Karma. Yes it is."

{{champion:43}}  *Semi-disgusted look* "Ugh."
Ayy, seems like Karma never had a man.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bYQbJQBa,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2015-06-23T23:39:33.032+0000)
>
> Ayy, seems like Karma never had a man.

She's a strong independant Ionian who don't need no man.
{{champion:56}} I don't know where to go from here. it ruins the whole situation. I guess I could kidnap people.

http://pre05.deviantart.net/2259/th/pre/i/2014/324/9/d/syndra_trance_by_prismacube-d872ar5.png

ಠ\_ಠ This is going to be _hard_.
I have to say that's an interesting picture though.
Right from my "saved for later use" Syndra folder.
You've got an entire folder of Syndra pictures for stuff like this?  Wow.

Different kinds of things.
Currently 192 files, but I've seen some redundant copies, such as thumbnails that I thought were full size, so it might be ~160 files.

Ya see. Folders with pictures tend to load quite a lot so I couldn't just let them all sit in the same folder.
Is it possible? Another syndra main... :D

Suspiciously similar to one crazy pink haired anime psychopath >.>

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
I love it.

{{champion:112}} The glorious womanizing.
{{champion:103}} Uhm, I wouldn't need a wingman if I had her by my side. Rawr.
{{champion:268}} The order is given... to join us for some drinks, fine ladies. *Later that night in the room next to mine* ''SHURIMA HAS RISEN AGAIN.'' (Sorry it had to be done)
Actually you probably would need a wingman/wingwoman if you had {{champion:103}} , because she'd steal your soul.
Udyr will give me a love gank.

{{champion:90}} "Here, take this *hands over voidling*. Voidlings are adorable, so it won't be hard to win her over with its help. Also if things don't work out, it could easily dispose of her for you"

> [{quoted}](name=LeachimKcorruts,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bYQbJQBa,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-23T02:31:02.810+0000)
>
> {{champion:44}}: So confident, with this guy helping me I might as well own her... unless he steals her from me
> http://38.media.tumblr.com/c1591ed4f9fa7fc1f7941d252d8f3922/tumblr_mjvkah4Q4m1rjcfxro1_400.gif

{{champion:150}} 

Here's how I picture my date going with Gnar as my wing-yordle:

My date: *Picks up Gnar and begins hugging him. She doesn't show a sign of stopping* OMG, HE'S SO CUTE! What's his name?!
Me: His name is Gnar. Don't get too attached, though, he's my bud. *Under breath* And pushing his luck a bit currently.
My date: Aw, I just constantly wanna hug him and love him and he's just so cute!
Me: Hey Gnar, come here for a sec. Excuse us, please.
*In a decently-secluded place*
Me: Gnar, why are you trying to steal my date's attention? You realize I'M her boyfriend, right?
{{champion:150}} >:) *Gets above 50 Rage*
Me: Oh shit. OK, yeah, you've convinced me. You're right, you should be the attention centerpiece.
{{champion:150}} Gnar! :D

Bright sides:
- Awesome bodyguard.
- Cute af.
- Boomerang is really useful for stuff. And pranks.
Down sides:
- Cute af. Will probably be the centerpiece of affection for your dates/lovers/friends.
- Draws LOTS of attention.
- Will probably end up catching me in his GNAR!!! a lot.
- Can't freaking understand him. He doesn't speak English.

{{champion:45}} 
Craaaaap...

{{champion:30}} 

fuck this shit im out

Karaoke Night
{{champion:30}}: Hey guys I got a great song :D
You: Naw it's cool really <:D
{{champion:30}}: Just listen
 http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140630010047/degrassi/images/d/d4/Final-Countdown.gif
aaaand she's dead

{{champion:19}} 
Umm, this won't work
Its only fun if they run ;^)
They can't say no when they are suppressed
{{champion:35}}  i am extremely concerned for everyone within Deceive distance
{{champion:107}} ...not sure how this would work. Unless ladies are into sentient lions they can fight bears/gorillas/aliens with his bear hands
It is mating season after all {{champion:76}}
{{champion:21}} Can I just go with her instead?

"Ah such a romantic date under the shade of the tree watching the starlight"
"I know, just for you, here are some roses."
"Aww thank you. How did you find this place? I did not remember a tree here at all."
"I uhh went here ever since I was uuuh a child."
"That's cute"
*whisper* "thanks mate"
{{champion:57}} You owe me a drink and a bag of fertilizer
Well.... {{champion:429}} Just don't kill her ok?
{{champion:222}} well uhh, idk, won't she just kill everything? .-.
Nah, she doesn't kill just because she can. Although, there will be casualties as she destroys everything else with massive hexplosives.

{{champion:154}} : Would make for an awesome seat and he wouldn't even mind!

{{champion:161}} : He already killed my date... Then proceeded to tell me we would have had a great future together!

{{champion:83}} : If m'lady died from alcohol poisoning he would bring her back with his ult!

{{champion:412}} : He would kill me and my date ;-;
I think thresh would just kill your date, seal her in his lantern, and then give you two laser pistols and say "Enjoy hunting me XD"
{{champion:254}}  I see a threesome in my future.
{{champion:266}} Small

{{champion:110}} They say to aim for the heart, so that's the easy part, then you..
Me: I think you should leave

{{champion:134}} *Heavy Breathing*

{{champion:103}} She'll probably go home with the whole bar licking her feet...

{{champion:161}}  ....

{{champion:99}}  I think I can live with this

{{champion:201}} This also works nicely, although his manliness could make me obsolete.

{{champion:222}} Um, yeah. Everyone hit the deck!!

{{champion:111}}  Echo's from the deep (if you know what i mean >.>)

{{champion:432}} ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.................
{{champion:112}} Ummmm... yeah. He doesn't really seem like much of a socialite either...

{{champion:103}}  Waifu Ahri, been playing since lvl 7. Much fluff, and I'm sure she has a nice personality ;-;
{{champion:37}}    Much music, very ~~bust~~ burst. Such utility, WOW!
 I didn't realize how much of a loser I was before this post ;-; thanks man. -____-  
{{champion:38}}  Kassawin, that's all I really have to say.
{{champion:112}}  It's all in the name.
{{champion:56}}  I can spook people with him 8/8 plz r8 gr8 m8

It sure is a shame that riot decided to slaughter all of my mains this Meta ;-;. Sure they can still be played to great effect despite the 4 tank/bruiser comps, but they all feel like shadows of their former selves. Except Viktor, it's all in the name :3.
